childMarkdownRemark.html: An incredible design from artist Jess Hannigan to support OSHWA!

image.description: A photo of the Make Share Iterate t-shirt to benefit OSHWA.

body.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"OSHWA is in a pickle! In the US where our not for profit is registered there is a law stating that one third of all income must be from the public, while we have been extremely lucky to have received private grants if we don’t have enough public contributions our status will be revoked.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Today we are launching a merch fundraiser with an incredible design from artist Jess Hannigan that will help us keep going. You can snag your own tee/hoodie/v-neck ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.customink.com/fundraising/oshwa"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"right here","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" you’ll be helping us maintain our status and any additional funds raised will go right back into making cool things happen in our community!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
